hanzi-su-wiki:
寝

Значения

Спать; укладывать спать; придерживать (например, товары)

Мнемоника

  • Сон, которому люди подвержены 受 на дощатых 爿 топчанах и под крышей дома 宀.

  • "Два человека спят."

Варианты

寢
purpleculture_pinyin:
qǐn
to lie down
лечь
rtega_mnemonic:
寢寢RS
寝寝		sleep, rest, bed chamber
  • invade 𠬶 a house 宀 see a tree trunk 爿/丬 and fall asleep: there was nothing to steal
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 寢)
Ideographic: A person 彐冖又 lying down on a bed 丬 in their home 宀
purpleculture_examples:
寝室 [ qǐn shì ]: bedroom; dormitory; Classifiers: 间
就寝 [ jiù qǐn ]: to go to sleep; to go to bed (literary)
废寝忘食 [ fèi qǐn wàng shí ]: to neglect sleep and forget about food (idiom); to skip one's sleep and meals; to be completely wrapped up in one's work
寿终正寝 [ shòu zhōng zhèng qǐn ]: to die of old age; to die in one's bed at a ripe old age; (fig.) (of a structure or machine etc) to come to the end of its life
寝食不安 [ qǐn shí bù ān ]: to lose appetite and sleep (from worry) (idiom)
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 宀 [gàimian2] roof; house
    • ⿰ Left to right
      • 丬 [ qiáng ] half of tree trunk
      • ⿳ Above to middle and below
        • 彐 [ jì ] snout
        • 冖 [ mì ] cover
        • 又 [ yòu ] and, also, again, in addition
heisig_chinese_memo: After work, the French maid goes home and lies down with a turtle to get some shuteye. Turtle? Well, he's sloooow and always hard... (thanks to Nukemarine and Wakela!).
heisig_constituent: lie down, house, turtle, French maid, tickle, broom, crown, crotch
heisig_story: Do not confuse this key word with either the element for reclining or the character for prostrated (Frame 1035). Its primitive elements are: house . . . turtle . . . broom . . . crown . . . crotch.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: lie down, sleep, rest, bed, remain unsold
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: полежать, сон, отдых, кровать, остаются непроданными
koohiiStory1: After work, the French maid goes home and lies down with a turtle. Turtle? Well, he´s sloooow and always hard... (thanks to Nukemarine and Wakela!).
koohiiStory2: After being hit on the head encroach (#1148), the condom salesman goes back to his house to lie down. He hasn´t made a single sale today, so he doesn´t have enough money to buy a pillow. He lies down on his pet turtle and cries himself to sleep.
kunYomi: ね.る、ね.かす、い.ぬ、みたまや、や.める
jp_example_words:
寝かせる(ねかせる): to put to bed, to lay down, to ferment
寝台(しんだい): bed, couch
寝坊(ねぼう): sleeping in late
寝巻(ねまき): sleep-wear, nightclothes, pyjamas, nightgown, nightdress
昼寝(ひるね): nap (at home), siesta
朝寝坊(あさねぼう): over sleep
寝る(ねる): go to bed, lie down, sleep
jp_readingExamples: 寝かす (ね.かす), 寝る (ね.る)
WaniKani_Radicals: 宀, 丬, ヨ, 冖, 又
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: From the roof, an icicle falls and hits wolverine in the forehead, and he has to go over to the stool to lie down. And eventually he goes to sleep.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Picture this entire scene. The icicle falls in slow motion from the roof. It hits wolverine right in the middle of his forehead. He goes down. He has to lie down. He has to sleep.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: While wolverine sleeps, he makes a horrible neighing (ね) sound. It's like there's a giant horse in his mouth screaming to get out! NEIGH NEIGH!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Wolverine might have a concussion that's making him neigh in his sleep. I guess it's good that he's laying down, but I'm pretty sure you're not supposed to sleep... Maybe you should wake him up so the neighing will stop—I mean, so he'll be okay!
Ru_Meaning: lie down, sleep, rest, bed, remain unsold
Ru_Radicals: 冖 (ва), 又 (опять), 宀 (значок У), ヨ, 爿 (левая сторона)
Ru_trainchinese: qǐn: (глаг/сущ) ложиться спать; спальня; склеп, усыпальница
Kanshudo_mnemonic: again (又) under the cover (冖) you give a yo (ヨ) as you lay your left side (丬) down under the roof (宀) to sleep
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The class dunce plans class pranks before he get some shuteye at home on his bunk beds.

寝字的基本解释

寝
（寢）
qǐn
睡，卧：寝室。寝车。寝宫。安寝。
睡觉的地方：就寝。寿终正寝。
皇家宗庙后殿藏先人衣冠之处，亦指帝王的坟墓：寝庙。陵寝。
停止，平息：其议遂寝（那种议论于是平息）。事寝。
面貌难看：貌寝。

寝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qǐn］
［《廣韻》七稔切，上寢，清。］
亦作“寑1”。亦作“1”。“寝1”的繁体字。
(1)睡；卧。
(2)引申为物体横放着。参见“寢石”。
(3)寝宫；卧室。
(4)古代帝王宗庙之后殿，为放置祖宗衣冠之处。
(5)指陵寝。秦汉以后帝王陵墓上的正殿。
(6)止息；废置。
(7)谓湮没不彰；隐蔽。
(8)丑陋。
(9)通“寖”。逐渐。
(10)通“祲”。使盛大。

寝字的英文翻译

◎ 寝
bedroom, sleep

寝字的康熙字典解释

【寅集上】【宀字部】　寢； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页290第12
〔古文〕??寑【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?七稔切，侵上聲。【說文】臥也。【詩·小雅】乃寢乃興。【論語】宰予晝寢。　又【廣韻】堂室也。【爾雅·釋宮】無東西廂，有室曰寢。周制，王公六寢，路寢一，小寢五。路寢，冶事之所，小寢，燕息之地也。【公羊傳·莊三十二年】路寢者何，正寢也。　又寢廟。凡廟，前曰廟，後曰寢。【詩·小雅】奕奕寢廟，君子作之。【商頌】寢成孔安。【註】廟中之寢，所以安神也。　又陵寢。【史記·樂書】三代以前，未有墓祭。至秦始出寢，起於墓側。漢因秦制，上陵皆有園寢。　又凡居室皆曰寢。【禮·王制】庶人祭於寢。　又息也。【前漢·?法志】兵寢?措。【唐書·裴度傳】汲黯在朝，淮南寢謀。　又寢丘，縣名，在汝南。【前漢·地理志應劭註】叔敖子所邑之地，後更名固始。　又叶衣檢切，音揜。【詩·小雅】乃安斯寢。叶上簟。簟音忝。　【集韻】亦作?。

寝字的源字形

寝字的起名意思

卧，睡觉。也指卧室。

sleep
Basic explanation of words
sleep
(sleep)
qǐn
Sleep, sleep: dormitory. Sleeping car. Bedroom. Sleep peacefully.
Sleeping place: going to bed. End of life.
The place where the ancestor's clothing is hidden in the anterior hall of the royal ancestral temple also refers to the tomb of the emperor: the sleeping temple. Mausoleum.
Stop, calm down: the discussion goes to bed (the discussion then calms down). Things sleep.
Ugly appearance: appearance.
sleep
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qǐn］
["Guang Yun" Qi Min cuts, goes to bed, clears. ]
Also known as "寢1". Also known as "1". Traditional characters for "床1".
(1) Sleeping; lying down.
(2) The extension is that the object is placed horizontally. See "sleeping stone".
(3) The bedroom; the bedroom.
(4) The back hall of the ancient emperor's ancestral temple was the place where the ancestors' clothes were placed.
(5) Refers to the mausoleum. The main hall on the tombs of emperors after the Qin and Han dynasties.
(6) Stop interest; abolish.
(7) It is said that the oblivion is oblivious; it is concealed.
(8) Ugly.
(9) Through "dipping". gradually.
(10) Link "Shu". Make grand.
sleep
English translation of words
◎ Bed
bedroom, sleep
sleep
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words

sleep
Source glyph
sleep
Name meaning
Lying, sleeping. Also refers to the bedroom.
寝(寝)qin
震
寢
在一间房屋里有一把扫帝,
表示把屋子打扫干净好让人休
息。“寝”的本义是“躺着休息或睡
觉”、也指“卧室”。古籍也通“度”。
宿 寝 寝
ソ111111
Цинь
шок
спать
В доме есть подметальная машина, а значит убирать в доме и отдыхать.
Первоначальное значение слова «сон» - «отдыхать или спать лежа», также относится к «спальне».
Древние книги также проходят «степень».
Спать в
qǐn
I гл.
1) спать, засыпать; ложиться спать, отдыхать лёжа, лежать; лежачий; спальный
深夜未寝 глубокой ночью не спать
寝不言 не разговаривать лёжа в постели
见寝石, 以为伏虎也 увидев лежачий камень, решил, что это притаившийся тигр
2) останавливаться, прекращаться; отступать; сниматься (напр. с обсуждения)
此事已寝 это дело уже прекращено
II сущ.
1) внутренние покои, опочивальня, спальня
九十, 饮食不离寝 в 90 лет пить и есть не покидая опочивальни (внутренних покоев)
2) * внутреннее помещение храма предков (для хранения одежд умерших); склеп, усыпальница
太寝 храм предков
陵寝 зал на могильном кургане
III наречие
* постепенно, шаг за шагом
寝以陵夷 постепенно приходить в упадок
IV прил.
* уродливый, некрасивый
貌寝 внешность безобразна
V собств. и усл.
1) цинь (двадцати шестая рифма тона 上 в рифмовниках; двадцать шестое число в телеграммах)
2) Цинь (фамилия)

寝

Значения

Спать; укладывать спать; придерживать (например, товары)

Мнемоника

  • Сон, которому люди подвержены 受 на дощатых 爿 топчанах и под крышей дома 宀.

  • "Два человека спят."

Варианты

寢

Radicals: 宀, 丬, ヨ, 冖, 又  (roof, icicle, wolverine, forehead, stool)
Meaning Mnemonic
From the roof, an icicle falls and hits wolverine in the forehead, and he has to go over to the stool to lie down. And eventually he goes to sleep.
Picture this entire scene. The icicle falls in slow motion from the roof. It hits wolverine right in the middle of his forehead. He goes down. He has to lie down. He has to sleep.
Reading Mnemonic
While wolverine sleeps, he makes a horrible neighing (ね) sound. It's like there's a giant horse in his mouth screaming to get out! NEIGH NEIGH!
Wolverine might have a concussion that's making him neigh in his sleep. I guess it's good that he's laying down, but I'm pretty sure you're not supposed to sleep... Maybe you should wake him up so the neighing will stop—I mean, so he'll be okay!
